TopicTitle: Parts disappear after placing / connecting them. Then cannot click anywhere.

Articles.Content:
Having an issue when placing parts during construction.  
The part will when placed will disappear and then I cannot click anywhere else.    I've been driving myself mad trying to figure out what mod is causing it. 

Here is a video of someone else having the same issue:   https://imgur.com/a/yJxhC58

Edited November 21, 2022 by 18Watt
Edited by moderation team.
Weird. Try clearing "input locks" using the alt-f12 debug menu when the problem occurs. Maybe something in your install is spamming input locks.

I think you are getting a NullReferenceException on a internal Editor handler.

Please post your KSP.log after reproducing the problem (please quit KSP or at least go to Main Menu before copying the KSP.log to avoid getting it truncated) on dropbox or something, and I will give a took to see where things are going South for you.
